A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: visually stunning film but the plot was terrible. Actually got bored half way through and leia doing her mary poppins impression is just terrible.\nThey could of done so much more with the characters but chose not too. \nive been left so disappointed\, its just a mash up of empire and return of the jedi for the most of it and its just an utter let down\,this is coming from a massive fan.
